ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Wind Energetic Particle Acceleration, Composition and Transport (EPACT)/LEMT 1-Hr Spin-Sectored H,He,O,Fe Counts for Events

RevisionEvent.Note: Only known prior ReleaseDate of the metadata

Added PublicationInfo. Added ResourceType and NamingAuthority. Changed http to https in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Fixed version number separator in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Matched version number in schemaLocation attribute to updated value in Version tag. ZCB
Added MetadataRightsList and RightsList(s). Updated to 2.7.1. ZCB

ResourceHeader.Description:
This data set contains hourly counts of H, He, O 
and Fe nuclei in 16 look directions about the spacecraft spin axis.  
Counts for each of the four species are given at 2.5-5 MeV/n, and an 
additional count is given for 5-8 MeV/n He.  As of 10/2011, the data 
cover 39 1997-2006 multi-day intervals that include energetic solar 
particle events.  ASCII data words are comma-separated.  For a given 
particle event, there are species-specific files.  File naming uses 
the convention XX_sec_YYYYMMDD, where XX = H, He2 (2.5-5 MeV/n), 
He5 (5-8 MeV/n), O or Fe, and where YYYYMMDD is the day of the first 
record of the file.  Sectoring is defined with respect to the 
ecliptic plane projection of the concurrently measured magnetic
field vector.  The edge of sector #1 is coincided with the projection 
of B on the ecliptic plane, so phi value of the center of sector i 
is phiB+11.25+(i-1)*22.5 deg, where phiB is the longitudinal angle 
of B.

PublicationInfo.Authors: Rosenvinge, Tycho T. V.; Reames, Donald V.

Rights.Note: CC0 1.0 Universal is the Creative Commons license applicable to all publicly available NASA Heliophysics data products

AccessURL.Name: Wind repository

File-level access to event-specific, species-specific 
ASCII files

Parameter.Name: Time
Parameter.Description: Universal time at start of hour average

Structure.Description:
Year, month, day, hour at start of average, and
fractional day of year at midpoint of average

Parameter.Name: Species-specific counts
Parameter.Description:
Counts in 16 look directions, for species identified 
in the file name (H,He2,He5,O, or Fe)

Structure.Description:
This is a 16 element array containing counts
in each of 16 look directions.
